chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Kymer, p. 42—Wise One of the Tomanelle Aiel. She is one of the younger group of Wise Ones, being about ten years older than Aviendha. She has deep red hair and a long, tanned face. Han, clan chief of the Tomanelle, is her sister-father. See also Han.
